message: The RATIONALE field for indicator 4-7-2, translated into en
data: Sex education, prevention of violence and abuse, and provision of knowledge about HIV is a matter of great concern to the whole society, so the introduction of basic education programs on sex and prevention of violence violence, abuse, providing HIV knowledge in teaching at schools is very necessary. Show the society's interest in educating children about gender, violence and abuse issues, providing facts about HIV so that children can protect themselves.
